Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common

Class L10nUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.common.L10nUtil
  • public class L10nUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Assists with application localization. Helps obtain the correct times and languages for the current locale.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private L10nUtil()
      Prevents direct class instantiation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String getLanguage​(java.lang.String bundleKey)
      Gets the language string associated with a given key from languageBundle_**.properties based on the default locale detected.
      static java.sql.Timestamp LocalToUtc​(java.time.ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime)
      Converts local time stored in a java.time.ZonedDateTime to UTC in the form of a java.sql.Timestamp.
      static java.time.ZonedDateTime utcToLocal​(java.sql.Timestamp timestamp)
      Converts UTC time coming from a java.sql.Timestamp to a java.time.ZonedDateTime based on the current ZoneId.

      • utcToLocal

        public static java.time.ZonedDateTime utcToLocal​(java.sql.Timestamp timestamp)
        Converts UTC time coming from a java.sql.Timestamp to a java.time.ZonedDateTime based on the current ZoneId.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - UTC time to be converted
        Returns:
        Local time based on the current timezone

        Converts local time stored in a java.time.ZonedDateTime to UTC in the form of a java.sql.Timestamp.
        Parameters:
        zonedDateTime - Local time to be converted
        Returns:
